board(address,address,bytes).details: Boards the auctioned token to an Ark

params.ark: The address of the Ark contract
params.data: Additional data required by the Ark to board rewards
params.rewardToken: The address of the reward token to board the rewards to

buyTokens(address,address,uint256).details: Allows users to buy tokens from an active auction

params.amount: The amount of tokens to purchase
params.ark: The address of the Ark contract
params.rewardToken: The address of the reward token being auctioned

returns.paymentAmount: The amount of payment tokens required to purchase the specified amount of reward tokens

params._accessManager: Address of the access manager contract

finalizeAuction(address,address).details: Finalizes an auction after its end time has been reached

params.ark: The address of the Ark contract
params.rewardToken: The address of the reward token that was auctioned

generateRole(uint8,address).details: This function is used to create unique role identifiers for contract-specific roles

params.roleTargetContract: The address of the contract the role is for

getAuctionInfo(address,address).details: Retrieves information about a specific auction

params.ark: The address of the Ark contract
params.rewardToken: The address of the reward token

returns._0: The Auction struct containing auction details

getCurrentPrice(address,address).details: Gets the current price of tokens in an ongoing auction

params.ark: The address of the Ark contract
params.rewardToken: The address of the reward token

returns._0: The current price of the auction

getObtainedTokens(address,address).details: Retrieves the amount of harvested rewards for a specific Ark and reward token

params.ark: The address of the Ark contract
params.rewardToken: The address of the reward token

returns._0: The amount of harvested rewards for the specified Ark and token

harvest(address,bytes).details: Harvests rewards from the specified Ark without auctioning or reinvesting

params.ark: The address of the Ark contract to harvest rewards from
params.rewardData: Additional data required by a protocol to harvest

harvestAndStartAuction(address,address,b.details: Harvests rewards from the specified Ark and starts an auction for the harvested tokens

params.ark: The address of the Ark contract to harvest rewards from
params.paymentToken: The address of the token used for payment in the auction
params.rewardData: Additional data required by a protocol to harvest

startAuction(address,address,address).details: Starts a Dutch auction for the harvested rewards of a specific Ark and reward token

params.ark: The address of the Ark contract
params.paymentToken: The address of the token used for payment in the auction
params.rewardToken: The address of the reward token to be auctioned

sweep(address,address[]).details: Sweeps tokens from the specified Ark and returns them to the caller

params.ark: The address of the Ark contract to sweep tokens from
params.tokens: The addresses of the tokens to sweep

returns.sweptAmounts: The amounts of the tokens that were swept
returns.sweptTokens: The addresses of the tokens that were swept

sweepAndStartAuction(address,address[],a.details: Sweeps tokens from the specified Ark and starts an auction for them

params.ark: The address of the Ark contract to sweep tokens from
params.paymentToken: The address of the token used for payment in the auction
params.tokens: The addresses of the tokens to sweep

updateAuctionDefaultParameters((uint40,u.details: Updates the default parameters for future auctions

auctions(address,address).notice: Mapping of ongoing auctions for each Ark and reward token

generateRole(uint8,address).notice: Generates a role identifier for a specific contract and role

nextAuctionId().notice: Counter for generating unique auction IDs

obtainedTokens(address,address).notice: Mapping of harvested rewards for each Ark and reward token

paymentTokensToBoard(address,address).notice: Mapping of payment tokens boarded to each Ark and reward token

unsoldTokens(address,address).notice: Mapping of unsold tokens for each Ark and reward token
